summary: A multi-school installation completed during summer break, now serving as a teaching tool for students.
description: Horizon School District selected Third Fuse Energy to install solar systems across five schools in their district. The project was completed entirely during summer break and includes educational displays that allow students to monitor real-time energy production.
highlights: Educational monitoring displays in each school

testimonial.quote: Not only did Third Fuse Energy deliver the project on time during our summer break, but they also created wonderful educational materials that our teachers use every day.
testimonial.author: Dr. Susan Martinez
